name: StraltoTransit
0:
”Alexa, ask transit conductor, what the commute to work looks like”
”Alexa, ask transit conductor, where is my train to work”
”Alexa, ask transit conductor, when is the bus to work coming”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: transit conductor
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Currently in beta, Stralto Transit provides a quick snapshot of your commute using real time data(where available). 

Please read instructions on https://www.stralto.com/transithelp before using this skill.
\
The beta currently works for public transit in the New York City metro area. 

Just go to https://transit.stralto.com and create a profile with your amazon account. 

Add a trip name that is easy for you to pronounce and easy for Aexa to understand.

NOTE: The skill is currently meant to work for the New York City metro area and uses real time feeds alone to determine your next train or bus. If there are no trains or busses arriving for your route in the near future(they are not in the real time feed), you will get a response stating that the there is no trains or busses in the real time feed.
